column1: Local Foods////I ordered the Bacon Steak and Egg sandwich with beet salad and sweet potato salad on the side. I have to say that the sandwich was amazing
column2: albeit an artery-clogging risk. In it were skirt steak
column5: and spicy aioli all on a bilillo roll. The beet salad was sweet
column6: but can be a questionable choice for some people. The sweet potato salad was really good and creamy.
